meta_desc: Learn about the terms and conditions of using the VOW platform and services
title: Terms & Conditions
a_text_one: is an online platform, the main purpose of which is to provide a service
a_text_two: for users in return for a subscription payment, which can be monthly, bi-yearly, or yearly, or a one-time payment for the Website’s premium service
b_text: “We”; “Our”; “Us”; or a similar reference refers to View On Website Portal Co. LLC, which is licensed by Dubai Economy and Tourism, holding license number 1130382 with offices in Dubai, United Arab Emirates
b_text_two: We own and manage the Website. The terms “you”; “your”; “user”; “users”; or a similar reference refers to you as a user of the Website.
c_text_two: govern your use of this Website. By accessing or using this Website, you agree to comply with these Terms. If you do not agree with any part of these Terms, please refrain from using this Website.
d_text: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or otherwise change the Website, these Terms or any part thereof at any time without notice. We may revise these Terms by updating this page. By continuing to use this website after any changes, you agree to be bound by the revised Terms.
e_text: When you use this Website and/or create an account, you make the following representations and warranties to us:
e_one: You are at least 18 years old, are legally allowed to view the Website and transact via the Website (if and as required), and meet our eligibility criteria details in the Terms;
e_two: You have provided valid, true and accurate information at the time of your registration on the Website;
e_three: You consent to your registration information being used for the purchase of our Services, as detailed elsewhere in the Terms;
e_four: That you will use the Website for its intended use only and in accordance with the Terms;
e_five: That the security of your username and password on the Website shall be your sole responsibility, and you will immediately notifyus if you lose your username and password for your user account or it otherwise becomes compromised in any way;
e_six: You do not intend nor will you attempt to interrupt, interfere oract in any manner whatsoever that may be contrary to the Terms orthe laws of the UAE.
e_text_two: It is your responsibility to ensure you understand all aspects of the Services to which you subscribe prior to subscribing. Once a subscription is completed through the Website, any cancellations shall be in accordance with the Cancellation Policy in these Terms. A subscription is complete once you submit your payment details and we receive your payment, irrespective of whether or not you subsequently receive, use or want the subscription. You are solely responsible for any disclosures of information you create or initiate regarding the Services; and the accuracy of the account information you provide and the type of subscription you select via the Website is your sole responsibility.
e_text_three: We do not make any guarantees or representations about the quality, timeliness, safety or delivery of the Services, and you agree that we are relieved and indemnified from any issues or claims from you with anything related to the Website, and/or Services.
f_text: We offer the following subscription payment options for our Services:
f_one: Monthly: Payments are due on a monthly basis.
f_two: Bi-Yearly: Payments are due every six months.
f_text_two: We also offer our Premium Service, which includes additional features, for a one-time payment for the entire lifetime of your account.
f_text_three: All payments will be processed through the Stripe payment gateway. The user agrees to comply with the terms and conditions of Stripe and acknowledges that the Website does not store or retain any payment-related information. Regardless of the chosen payment option, payment for your subscription and/or the one-time premium service provided by the Website is due within seven (7) days of the account creation date, or within seven (7) days of receiving notice of payment, whichever is applicable.
f_text_four: Failure to make payment within the specified timeframe may result in suspension or termination of the account. In the event of non-payment or a failed payment, we reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account, at our sole discretion. We shall not be liable for any loss or damage resulting from the suspension or termination of your account due to non-payment.
f_text_five: We will send billing notices to the email address registered with your account. It is your responsibility to ensure that the provided email address is accurate and up to date. You acknowledge that failure to receive or read billing notices does not exempt you from the obligation to make timely payments. Payments made for the services are non-refundable, except as expressly stated in our refund policy.
g_text: Fees paid for the Services offered on this Website are non-refundable,unless expressly stated otherwise. Any requests for refunds must bemade in writing and will be considered at our sole discretion. Thedecision to grant a refund, whether in part or in full, will be basedon the circumstances surrounding the request and shall not establish aprecedent for future transactions.
g_text_two: In cases where a refund is approved, we reserve the right to deduct any applicable administrative fees, processing charges, or other costs associated with the refund. Refunds, if approved, will be processed using the same method of payment used for the original transaction, unless otherwise agreed upon by both parties.
g_text_three: In all situations, payment for the premium service is non-refundable.
h_text: Users are strictly prohibited from utilizing this Website or any of its associated Services for any activities that are illegal, immoral, or contrary to public interests. By accessing or using this Website, you agree that you will not engage in any of the following:
h_one: Illegal Activities: Any use of the Website that violates local, national, or international laws, regulations, or statutes. This includes but is not limited to activities such as hacking, unauthorized access to computer systems, distribution of malware or malicious content, infringement of intellectual property rights, and any other illegal actions.
h_two: Immoral or Unethical Conduct: Any use of the Website that involves engaging in activities that are considered immoral, unethical, or offensive. This includes but is not limited to activities such as explicit material, harassment, hate speech, discrimination, promotion of violence, exploitation of minors, or any other conduct that violates commonly accepted moral standards.
h_three: Public Interest Violation: Any use of the Website that goes against public interests, public safety, or the welfare of others. This includes but is not limited to activities such as incitement of violence, terrorism, promotion of illegal substances or activities, spreading false information or misinformation, or any other conduct that poses a threat to public well-being.
h_text_two: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to investigate and take appropriate legal action against any user engaging in prohibited activities. Violation of this clause and Clause E may result in the termination of your account and/or access to the Website, and may also involve reporting such activities to the relevant law enforcement authorities.
h_text_three: By using this Website, you acknowledge and agree that you are solely responsible for any consequences arising from your use of the Website and that you will comply with all applicable laws and regulations while using the Website and the Services.
i_text: Users may cancel their accounts and/or subscriptions on the Website atany time by following the designated account cancellation process,which may be accessible through the user’s account settings or bycontacting our customer support. Upon cancellation, the user’s accessto the Website’s subscribed services will be promptly deactivated, andall user data and information associated with the account will bepermanently deleted, subject to any applicable legal or regulatoryrequirements.
i_text_one: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend a user’s account and/or subscription without prior notice if there is a reasonable belief that the user has violated any provision of the Terms or engaged in any illegal, fraudulent, or unauthorized activities on the website. We may also terminate inactive accounts that have not paid for a subscription within seven days of the date of creation or have shown no activity for a prolonged period of time, as determined by us in our sole discretion. Prior to the termination, reasonable efforts will be made to notify the user via the email address associated with the account.
i_text_two: Upon termination of an account, the user’s access to the Website and its Services will be immediately revoked. We will not be liable to you or any third party for any termination of access to the website. Termination of an account will result in the permanent deletion of all user data and information associated with the account, subject to any applicable legal or regulatory requirements.
i_text_three: In the event of a user-initiated account and/or subscription cancellation or termination by us, we will not provide any refunds or credits for unused subscription periods or any remaining balance. Any fees or charges incurred prior to termination will not be refunded.
j_text_one: The content on this website, including text, images, graphics, logos, and other materials, is protected by intellectual property rights, including copyright and trademarks. The entire content of the Website, including but not limited to content, designs, graphics, photographs, videos, interactive presentations, logos, text, arrangements and layouts, are our sole and exclusive property or are licensed to us and all rights are reserved. All trademarks and trade names, and all other derivatives thereof, including the trademarks appearing on the Website, are proprietary to us and may only be used by licensees to whom we specifically grant or license such rights. You agree not to use, disseminate, publish or reverse engineer any content or other intellectual property of the Website, or help a third party to do so, without our prior written consent.
j_text_two: Ownership Rights. By accessing and using this Website, you acknowledge and agree that all ownership rights, including but not limited to intellectual property rights, in the content, materials, and any other information displayed or provided on the Website, belong solely and exclusively to us. We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to access and use the Website and its content for its intended purposes only, in accordance with these Terms. This license does not grant you any ownership rights or any rights to modify, reproduce, distribute, display, transmit, or create derivative works of the Website or its content, without our prior written consent.
k_text_one: We strive to provide accurate and up-to-date information on this website. However, we do not guarantee the completeness, accuracy, or reliability of any content on this Website. Your use of this Website is at your own risk, and we shall not be liable for any damages arising from your use of this website or reliance on any information provided herein. Additionally, maintenance of the Website’s premium service and subscription, including its further development and continuation, is subject to our sole discretion, and without liability to any party, including but not limited to users.
k_text_two: In no event will our collective liability or the liability of our employees, lawful agents, managers, directors, shareholders, or service providers exceed the amount of AED 1,000 in the aggregate, which includes any award for attorney’s fees and costs. This limitation of liability applies to any action, regardless of the party or parties that initiated it and whether the form of action is in contract, tort, or otherwise, and shall apply to the fullest extent possible under the law of the UAE.
k_text_three: In any case or action initiated by any party under any legal theory, we, our employees, lawful agents, managers, directors, shareholders, and/or service providers will not liable for damages of any kind, including but not limited to, actual, indirect, special, incidental, consequential, punitive, loss of income, revenue, or profits; loss of actual or anticipated business, loss of goodwill, data, or use; and damages associated with personal injury, emotional distress, pain and suffering, and injury to morality or reputation; whether caused by breach of contract, tort, or otherwise, and regardless if such damage or loss was foreseeable or not.
k_text_four: The above does not affect any liability that cannot be limited or excluded under UAE law.
l_text_one: By subscribing to our Website, you acknowledge and agree that your subscription will be automatically renewed for subsequent subscription periods unless you cancel or it is terminated prior to the renewal date. You authorize us to charge your chosen payment method for the renewal fees.
l_text_two: We will provide you with notice of the upcoming renewal at least seven (7) days before the automatic renewal date. The notice will be sent to the email address associated with your account or through other means of communication available on our platform.
l_text_three: If you wish to cancel your subscription and avoid automatic renewal, you must do so within the specified cancellation period, which is typically 30 days before the renewal date. Failure to cancel your subscription within this period will result in the automatic renewal of your subscription and the corresponding charges will be applied.
m_text_one: The services provided on this Website are intended solely for the benefit of the users and the Website owner, and no third party shall have any rights or benefits under these Terms. Unless expressly stated in these Terms, no provision of this agreement is intended to confer any rights or remedies upon any person or entity other than the user and the Website owner.
m_text_two: Any third party, including but not limited to affiliates, partners, or vendors, shall not be deemed a party to this agreement and shall have no rights to enforce or rely upon any provision of these Terms. The user agrees that no third party shall have any standing to assert a claim or take legal action directly against the website owner, and any attempt to do so shall be deemed null and void.
m_text_three: The limitation of third party rights set forth in this clause extends to any successors, assigns, representatives, or agents of the website owner. No third party shall acquire any rights, benefits, or interests by virtue of its relationship with the user or any interaction with the Website.
m_text_four: By accessing or using this Website, the user acknowledges and agrees that any rights or obligations arising from these Terms are solely between the user and the Website owner, to the exclusion of any third party.
n_text_one: We understand the importance of privacy and the confidentiality of your personal information. This clause outlines our commitment to safeguarding your information while also complying with applicable laws and legal requirements.
n_text_two: When you use our Website, you may be required to provide certain personal information. We collect and use this information solely for the purpose of providing and improving our Services, as outlined in our Privacy Policy. We are committed to maintaining the confidentiality of the information you provide to us. Except as otherwise stated in this clause or required by law, we will not disclose, share, sell, or rent your personal information to any third parties without your explicit consent.
n_text_three: We may disclose your personal information in the following circumstances:
n_one: Legal Obligation: We may share your information if we believe in good faith that such disclosure is necessary to comply with any applicable laws, regulations, legal processes, or government requests. This includes cooperating with law enforcement agencies, judicial proceedings, or court orders.
n_two: Protection of Rights: We may disclose your information to protect our rights, safety, or property, as well as the rights, safety, or property of our users, employees, or the general public.
n_three: Merger or Acquisition: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of all or a portion of our assets, your personal information may be transferred as part of the transaction. We will ensure that the receiving party maintains the same level of confidentiality as outlined in these terms and conditions.
n_text_four: We may also collect, use, and share anonymized and aggregated data for various purposes, including but not limited to analytics, research, and marketing. This data will not personally identify you. Additionally, our Website may contain links or integrations with third-party services or websites. This clause applies solely to information collected on our Website, and we are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of any third-party services. While we take reasonable measures to protect your information, it is important for you to understand that no data transmission over the internet or storage method can be guaranteed to be 100% secure. By using our Website, you acknowledge and accept this inherent risk.
o_text_one: By accessing or using this Website, you represent and warrant that you are at least 18 years old. If you are accessing or using the website on behalf of a company, organization, or other legal entity, you represent and warrant that you have the authority to bind such entity to these Terms. We may, at our sole discretion, request additional information or documentation to verify your eligibility as a company with a valid business license. Failure to provide such information or documentation may result in the suspension or termination of your account.
o_text_two: If you do not meet this eligibility requirement, you must refrain from accessing or using the Website. We reserve the right to refuse access to or terminate the accounts of individuals or entities that do not meet the eligibility requirement or violate any provision of these Terms, without prior notice or liability.
p_title: Use of Website for Intended Purposes
p_text_one: By accessing and using this Website, you agree to abide by the Terms. It is important to note that the Website is intended for specific purposes, and your use of the Website signifies your understanding and agreement to use it solely for its intended purposes. Any use of the Website that deviates from its intended purposes may result in the termination or suspension of your access to the Website, at our sole discretion. You are responsible for ensuring that your use of the Website complies with these Terms.
p_text_two: You agree to use the Website only for lawful purposes and in a manner that does not infringe upon or restrict the rights of others, or inhibit their enjoyment of the Website. You acknowledge that you will not use the Website to engage in any activity that is harmful, offensive, illegal, or that violates any applicable laws or regulations.
p_text_three: You agree not to use the Website in any manner that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair the functionality of the Website or interfere with any other party’s use of the Website. You also agree not to engage in any activity that may compromise the security, integrity, or availability of the Website or its associated systems.
q_title: Writing a Review or Leaving Feedback.
q_text: By submitting a review or providing feedback (“User Content”) on this Website, you agree to the following:
q_one: You acknowledge that any User Content you submit remains your sole responsibility. However, by submitting User Content, you grant the Website and its affiliates a worldwide, royalty-free, perpetual, irrevocable, non-exclusive, transferable license to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, translate, distribute, display, and perform such User Content in any media now known or hereafter developed, for any purpose whatsoever.
q_two: You represent and warrant that any User Content you submit is truthful and accurate to the best of your knowledge. You agree not to provide any false, misleading, or deceptive information.
q_three: You agree to comply with all applicable laws, regulations, and guidelines while submitting User Content. You shall not post any content that is defamatory, infringing, obscene, harassing, or otherwise objectionable.
q_four: The Website reserves the right, but not the obligation, to review, monitor, and remove any User Content that violates these Terms, without prior notice. We may exercise this right at our sole discretion.
q_five: You understand and agree that you are solely responsible for any User Content you submit. You bear all risks associated with the use of your User Content, including any reliance on its accuracy, completeness, or usefulness.
q_six: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless the Website, its owners, affiliates, employees, and agents from any claims, damages, liabilities, costs, or expenses arising out of or related to your User Content, including but not limited to any claims by third parties.
q_seven: We will handle your personal information in accordance with our Privacy Policy. By submitting User Content, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information as described in our Privacy Policy.
r_text: We are committed to protecting your privacy and complying with applicable data protection laws, including the EU General Data Protection Regulation (“GDPR ”). Our Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal data. By using this website, you consent to the processing of your personal data as described in our Privacy Policy.
x_text_one: The Website may include links to third party websites (“External Sites ”). Once you click or access these External Sites, you will leave the Website. We do not investigate, review, endorse, represent, condone or control the content of any of the External Sites, unless otherwise expressly stated in the Terms. We will not be responsible or held liable for the content displayed on External Sites, and you will access these External Sites at your sole risk. You also agree not to link any External Sites to the Website without our express prior written consent and approval, unless and to the extent doing so falls within the scope of our provided Services. External Sites may send their own cookies to you or otherwise collect data or solicit personal information and you are responsible for checking the External Sites to locate and review their terms and conditions, and Privacy Policy. You hereby acknowledge that you access, browse, link and/or bookmark the External Sites at your own risk.
x_text_two: You may see advertisements on the Website that are selected and delivered by third parties, such as ad networks, advertising agencies, advertisers and audience segment providers. These third parties may collect information about you and your online activities, either on the Website or on other websites, through cookies, web beacons, and other technology in an effort to understand your interests and deliver advertisements to you that are tailored to your interests. We do not have access to, or control over, the information that these third parties may collect, and we are not liable for their practices. The information practices of these third parties are neither covered in these Terms nor in our Privacy Policy. It is your responsibility to review the terms and conditions, and privacy policies of these third parties, and we are not liable for the actions or omissions of any third party.
y_text_one: We acknowledge the importance of addressing user grievances and concerns in a timely and effective manner. Therefore, we have appointed a Grievance Officer/Designated Representative (“Designated Representative”) to handle and redress user grievances relating to the Services provided through this Website.
y_text_two: The Designated Representative shall act as an independent and impartial point of contact for users who wish to raise complaints, grievances, or concerns regarding the Website or its Services. The Designated Representative shall ensure that all grievances are appropriately addressed and resolved in accordance with applicable laws and regulations.
y_text_three: Users can contact the Designated Representative through the following channels:
y_three: Contact Details: [INSERT DESIGNATED REPRESENTATIVE’S EMAIL ADDRESS AND/OR PHONE NUMBER]
y_text_four: Users must provide the following information when submitting a grievance to the Designated Representative:
y_tow_one: Full name and contact details of the user;
y_tow_two: Description of the grievance, including relevant details and supporting documents, if any;
y_tow_three: Any other information that may be reasonably required by the Designated Representative to investigate and address the grievance effectively.
y_text_five: We will ensure that the Designated Representative maintains strict confidentiality of all user grievances and information disclosed during the grievance redressal and appeal processes, except where required by law or necessary for the resolution of the grievance.
y_text_six: We will endeavour to resolve user grievances within a reasonable timeframe. We do not guarantee the resolution of all grievances, particularly those beyond our control or jurisdiction. In the event you are dissatisfied with the resolution provided by the Designated Representative, you may escalate the grievance through our appeals process, and then through appropriate legal channels as outlined in the Terms.
y_text_seven: Users agree to cooperate and provide accurate information to the Designated Representative during the grievance redressal and/or appeal process. Users shall not provide false, misleading, or malicious information with an intent to harm.
y_text_eight: The Designated Representative’s role is limited to handling grievances and concerns raised by users related to the Website and its Services. The Designated Representative does not assume responsibility for any disputes or legal matters arising between users or between users and third parties. By using this Website, users acknowledge and agree to the appointment of the Designated Representative and the grievance redressal and appeal processes.
z_text: You agree to hold us, our employees, managers, directors, lawful agents, and supervisors harmless and to defend and indemnify the same from and against any claim, action, liability, damage, loss, judgement, award, cost, expense or reasonable attorney’s fees that arise out of or are related to any violation of these Terms by you or your lawful agent.
s_text_one: In the event that we are prevented from performing any of our obligations under these Terms due to an event beyond our reasonable control, including but not limited to acts of God, war, terrorism, riots, strikes, lockouts, natural disasters, government actions, or any other event that is unforeseeable and unavoidable (“ ”Force Majeure Event”), then we shall be excused from the performance of such obligations for the duration of the Force Majeure Event.
s_text_two: We shall promptly notify you in a reasonable manner, providing details of the Force Majeure Event and its expected duration. We will make all reasonable efforts to mitigate the effects of the Force Majeure Event and resume the performance of our obligations as soon as practicable.
s_text_three: During the period of the Force Majeure Event, our obligations shall be suspended to the extent that they are affected by the Force Majeure Event. We shall not be liable for any damages, penalties, or losses incurred by you as a result of our non-performance or delay caused by the Force Majeure Event.
s_text_four: If the Force Majeure Event continues for a period of 30 days or more, we may terminate these Terms by providing written notice to the users. In such a case, we shall not be liable to you for any damages, penalties, or losses arising from the termination due to the Force Majeure Event.
s_text_five: A Force Majeure Event shall not relieve you from the obligation to make any payments that have already become due and payable prior to the occurrence of the Force Majeure Event, unless otherwise agreed in writing between us and you.
s_text_six: By using this Website, you acknowledge and agree that the performance of obligations under these Terms by us may be delayed or prevented by circumstances beyond our control, and you expressly waive any claim or right to seek damages or other remedies against us arising from such delay or prevention.
t_text: Any waiver by us of any term or condition set forth in these Terms shall not constitute a continuing waiver of such term or condition, and any failure by us to assert a claim or right under any provision of these Terms shall not constitute a waiver of the same claim or right. If any court finds any part of the Terms unenforceable, invalid, or illegal for any reason, then such part shall be deemed removed and the rest of the Terms shall continue to be in full force and effect to the fullest extent permissible by the applicable laws of the UAE.
u_text: The Terms and our Privacy Policy constitute the entire agreement between us and you regarding the Website and supersede any and all prior agreements, whether verbal or written.
v_text: These Terms are governed by the laws of the UAE, irrespective of any conflict of laws principles. Any dispute between us and you shall first be addressed by our grievance and appeal processes. Only after exhausting those options shall a dispute arising out of or in connection with these Terms, including any question regarding their existence, validity or termination, be referred to the Dubai International Arbitration Centre and finally resolved by arbitration under the DIAC Arbitration Rules in force on the date of the submission of the request for arbitration (“ Rules ”), which Rules are deemed to be incorporated by reference into this clause. The number of arbitrators, to be appointed in accordance with the Rules, shall be three. The legal seat of the arbitration shall be Dubai, UAE and the language of the arbitration shall be English.
w_text_one: You are using the Website at your own risk. We do not make any warranties or representations, whether express or implied, arising out of law or otherwise in relation to the accuracy of the content on the Website or the quality of the Services, and we assume no liability or responsibility for any errors or omissions in the content of the Website or in respect of any other issue with such goods, services or activities. We may make changes to the content or material in the Website without any prior notice. We are not under any commitment to update any content or material on the Website.
w_text_two: We reserve the right at all times to disclose any information that you may provide to us through the Website to our legal representatives and advisors and any governmental or federal authority in the UAE without any prior notice or prior consent requirement.
w_text_three: We shall not be held responsible or accountable to you or any third party relying on you and you agree to fully indemnify us for any loss, injury, claim or damage whether direct, indirect, consequential or punitive costs, liabilities, expenses, damages or otherwise that may be suffered by you through use of this Website or the purchase of Product(s). We shall not be liable for any virus, contaminating or destructive features or trojans that may affect your computer as a result of your use or access or interruption or inability to use or access the Website and/or any External Sites. You hereby waive any and all claims against us, our employees, shareholders, subsidiaries, divisions, affiliates, representatives, agents and licensors, arising out of your use or access or interruption or inability to use or access the Website.
